Q_DESC:
Write a java program to display the given String inputs using Class, Object, Constructor and this Keyword

Mandatory:

1. Create a Parameterised Constructor for MainClass (TestClass) with three String Inputs as s1, s2  s3

Hint:
 TestClass tc=new TestClass(s1,s2,s3)
 
2. Define the Parameterised Constructor :

a. Method name = TestClass 
b. Arguments = Three argument of Type String and variable names as name1, name2, name3   Hint:   TestClass(String name1,String name2,String name3) 
c. Use this operator to assign the three values from the arguments          Hint: this.namefirst=name1

3. Create a method with following details

a. Methodname = show
b. Type = void
c. Access Specifier = public
d. Argument = No argument
e. Usage = print the values assigned in the constructor using this operator
TESTCASE_1:
